t: Amazon.com: TAKVA: Zikr Ring
s: Easily perform your tasbih counts at any time, any place. Zikr Ring keeps a visual track record of your daily dhikr via the app, which in turn encourages you to increase your dhikr. With 3 different size rings in a box, you can customize the size of your own digital tasbih.
